sentences: Kusagilt ilmus välja veel paar põgenikku.
context: The word 'kusagilt' is an Estonian adverb that indicates something comes from or originates from an unspecified or unknown location. It's the illative case (direction into) form of 'kuskilt' (from somewhere). The word can be used affirmatively to indicate something确实来自某个地方, or negatively to indicate absence from all possible places.
